page.title: 12SERVICES
page.content:
The{Sinclair Bay Hotel}mostly has people staying in the summer time, in the tourist season. The two bars in the hotel are important for the social gathering places they provide the community.
GARAGE The garage is situated on the north side of the village. There the owner provides an important service repairing and maintaining cars, but also tractors, and he provides a general repair shop for anything mechanical. The garage does not sell petrol. The nearest{petrol}is in Auckengill to the north, and at Lochshell to the south.
BUS SERVICES Dunnet's Buses provide the local bus service.(See page 15)
